headline.print_headline: Obama's UN Envoy Takes Lead Role in Plane Response
headline.main: Obama's UN Envoy Takes Lead Role in Plane Response

lead_paragraph: One day after a passenger jet was shot out of the sky, Samantha Power took her seat at the United Nations Security Council and angrily began building the Obama administration's case against separatists in eastern Ukraine and their Russian benefactors.
